abstract: The topics are presented in viewgraph form, and the topics covered include the following: gratings, grating characteristics, grating manufacture, zone plate, zone plate characteristics, zone plate manufacture, holography, holographic aberration correction, wavefront generated holograms, computer generated holograms, fabrication, fabrication capabilities, replication, processing errors, and quality control.
title: Manufacturing the key to binary optics

organization.name: Army Research Office
organization.location: Research Triangle Park, NC, United States

publications.publicationName: NASA. Marshall Space Flight Center, Conference on Binary Optics: An Opportunity for Technical Exchange

related.title: Proceedings of the 1992 Annual Meeting NASA Occupational Health Program
